The documentated page. 
public class FormatText
  extends NestedFormat
{
    public String text;
    public int minHeight();
    public int minWidth();
    public int maxWidth();
    public int minLastWidth();
    public int maxLastWidth();
    public FormatText(int indentation,
                      String text);
    public FormatText(String text);
    public int appendText(int indentation,
                          FormatStream stream);
    public TextRectangle printTextBeside(int indentation,
                                         FormatStream stream,
                                         int width,
                                         int lastWidth);
    public void dumpText(PrintWriter writer);
}
